data.name: GemCore
data.detailed_description:
STORY

GemCore is a dystopian procedurally generated fast-paced roguelike arcade game where you play as an individual named REDACTED. They were indebted to the company bank upon their death. They had to have their body frozen, only to later have their consciousness uploaded as part of the employee repayment “ReCollection” system that they enrolled in years prior. In this universe, you choose your flavor of companies to work for while living, gaining gratification then, eternal damnation later.


Do you have what it takes to sign up for a bright future? Sign up for your own ReCollection plan today!

To repay any dept an employee is mandated to have their consciousness redownloaded, as many times as necessary, to generate production through the means of labor by acting as a galactic cartographer, carving out images of planets through echolocation for future excavation, as well as mining resources and eliminating hostile natives along the way.

The money ain't flowing if the train ain't going! Do your part to help the economy today by signing up for your nearest ReCollection plan today!

But one mustn't be worried yet! For their servitude isn't fully indentured! One may purchase the sweet release of electric sheep by paying it all within 21 days. All is fair in law and war! All of this and more are included in your package and can be read in your Terms and Conditions Agreements!

GAMEPLAY

With its in-depth hyper casual familiarity, its gameplay is second nature for casual players to pick up as well as supplementing a deep system of scenarios and systems that reward more hardcore players looking for a roguelike game loop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
